mapper.select: SELECT pk, pictureURLSmall, phone, APScore FROM phoneInfo WHERE phone LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' ORDER BY APScore DESC
SELECT pk, title, DATE_FORMAT(regDt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt, writer, img, url FROM news WHERE title LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' ORDER BY pk DESC
SELECT boardPk, category, title, ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(modDt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS modDt FROM board WHERE title LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' ORDER BY boardPk DESC
